episodes.title: Catholic priest wanted to kill Muslims in mosques
episodes.description:
A Catholic priest who admitted discussing bombing mosques and killing Muslims in neo-Nazi online chatrooms has been sentenced to a 12-month community order on Thursday 30 October.

Mark Rowles, 57, went by the name "skinheadlad1488" in a chatroom called “Aryan Reich Killers” to write violent and offensive messages about Muslims and black people.
